name: SLOTS: The Hunters
description:
-- Experience what the best social Vegas Casino Video Slot is like--
If you are not satisfied with different themes but same game play slot, then try SLOTS : The Hunters. From pub to forest and forest to dungeon! You can hunt stronger enemies with themes unlocked as you level. Go on an adventure!

Have a drink with friends in the pub, help out friends hunt monsters in the forest and face against giant monster hiding in the cave.
Win symbols from slot games to inflict critical damage on monsters and use special skills.
You need luck to match the symbols!
Pub
- Talk with other players and share benefits
Goblin’s Forest
- Hunt Goblins in front of you and receive benefits
- Bonus can be shared with other players.
Dungeon & Monsters
- Cooperate with other players to defeat a common enemy and receive bigger reward.
